products.title: HOT BREAD
products.description:
Childhood memory: you just woke up and you are going to run for pastries. In the bakery, the air is filled with the appetizing aroma of hot, freshly baked bread. I don’t have the strength to endure to the house, I want to bite off a crispy crust and feel how steam comes from the bread. We all did this, and everyone felt this dense, warm and inviting smell. 
The candle will create an atmosphere of a bakery and a carefree childhood in your home every day. This scent is incomparable

products.title: BY THE FIRE
products.description: Close your eyes and imagine the melodious crackling of a fireplace in a country house... Or a burning bonfire on a summer night, when the hair is soaked with the spicy aroma of smoke, and the night slowly flows into the morning ... The candle recreates the aroma of coniferous smoke and smoldering wood, mixing with notes of juniper and musk. It is at the same time the fragrance of home and comfort, freedom and childhood.
details: The heart of the fragrance: cedar, juniper

products.title: BY THE FIRE
products.description:
The scent of wishes come true. A wild beach with rolling ocean waves where you soak up the sun. The skin is chocolate-tanned, and the hair smells of sea air ... 
In this candle, the juiciness of green mango, the sweetness of peach, the warmth from the touch of the sun and the caramel sunset over the ocean are subtly intertwined. 
The light crackle of a burning wooden wick sounds like the sparks of an evening fire on the ocean. It remains only to close your eyes.

products.title: CHAMPAGNE ROSÉ
products.description:
The atmosphere of a leisurely breakfast on the balcony or backyard. Starting the morning with pink sparkling is like allowing yourself to live luxuriously. 
The bubbles slowly rise up, everything around is filled with the aroma of sparkling grapefruit, as if you had just broken off a slice of it. A fresh breeze blows you, bringing with it the smell of blackcurrant leaves and peaches. You are immersed in the memories of warm summer days in the country, when you picked blackcurrants for tea or jam.

products.title: FREESIA
products.description: It smells like spring air after the rain. It gathers the freshness of the first lilies of the valley and the astringency of meadow herbs. This is a childhood memory in which you run through the forest and pick the first flowers. Dew gently rolls from the stems to your palm. Pure and transparent aroma of a bouquet of violets and freesia. Soothing, slowing down and light.
details: Top notes: lily of the valley, lilac

products.title: FOCACCIA ROSMARINO
products.description: A fresh mix of exceptionally green notes of resinous rosemary and spicy rosemary combined with the aroma of lush dough. This fragrance will remind you of eternal summer and set you up for endless conversations in the kitchen.

products.title: FREESIA
products.description: It smells like spring air after the rain. It gathers the freshness of the first lilies of the valley and the astringency of meadow herbs. This is a childhood memory in which you run through the forest and pick the first flowers. Dew gently rolls from the stems to your palm. Pure and transparent aroma of a bouquet of violets and freesia. Soothing, slowing down and light.
details: Top notes: lily of the valley, lilac

products.title: J'AIME
products.description:
The scent of deep and true love. Confidence in your actions and words. Support, care, tenderness, sincerity, respect - all this is modern love. 
Noble notes of oud wood with a characteristic deep balsamic sound. The delicate heart of the composition is represented by delicate rose petals that open at the peak of their velvety and depth. They are framed by notes of cashmere, peony and cocoa.
details: Heart of the fragrance: rose, jasmine

products.title: Lavender
products.description: Universal candles in concise jars are suitable for ignition both at home and at work (beauty salon, office, study). Since they look very stylish and expensive, and when they begin to exude their aroma, then they will completely conquer your heart.

products.title: Alpine flowers
products.description: A cozy candle in a jar of dried flowers was created for family gatherings, for reading a good book, even for outdoor picnics. It will fit perfectly into the home interior and will be pleasing to the eye. The desired color of dried flowers can be specified in the comments to the order, we will definitely take into account your wishes.

products.title: Sherlock Holmes
products.description: Universal candles in concise jars are suitable for ignition both at home and at work (beauty salon, office, study). Since they look very stylish and expensive, and when they begin to exude their aroma, then they will completely conquer your heart.

products.title: Oak moss and amber
products.description:
The effect persists until the aromatic liquid evaporates the evaporation rate is affected by the temperature and humidity of the room, the higher they are, the faster the evaporation.
Diffusers really work well in the places you walk around as the scent from the sticks is carried by the air currents.
      when leaving home for a long time, remove the sticks and close the bottle so that the diffuser does not work in vain.
Place a diffuser in your entryway and you and your guests will be greeted with a wonderful scent as they enter.
details: Top notes: Oak moss and amber
